dcterms:creator: X. Li
D. Roth
dcterms:description: A heterogeneous dataset consisting of questions both manually constructed and published by TREC and USC, containing 5500 questions in English in the training set and another 500 in the test set. Each question has a label that classifies the answer in a two-level hierarchy with six main classes and 50 different labels.
dcterms:title: TREC and USC Dataset
